actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 218 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the maximum deduction allowable with respect to contributions to candidates for public office.

summary.text: Increases the maximum deduction allowable under the Internal Revenue Code with respect to contributions to candidates for public office to $100 on individual returns and $200 on joint returns.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 218 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the maximum deduction allowable with respect to contributions to candidates for public office.
